mapper.select: SELECT GN.GNID, GN.PID, GN.MC, GN.LB, GN.URL FROM T_GN gn LEFT JOIN T_JS_GN jsgn ON gn.gnid = jsgn.gnid LEFT JOIN T_JS js ON jsgn.jsid = js.jsid WHERE gn.ZT = '1' AND js.jsid in (select jsid from t_yh_js where YHID = #{gn.userId}) AND gn.pId != '-1' ORDER BY GN.PID , gn.PX ASC

SELECT GN.GNID, GN.PID, GN.MC, GN.LB, GN.URL FROM T_GN gn WHERE GN.GNID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT GNt.PID FROM T_GN gnt LEFT JOIN T_JS_GN jsgn ON gnt.gnid = jsgn.gnid LEFT JOIN T_JS js ON jsgn.jsid = js.jsid WHERE gnt.ZT = '1' AND js.jsid in (select jsid from t_yh_js where YHID = #{gn.userId}) ) ORDER BY GN.PID , gn.PX ASC
